Archives <s><u>Sent in May 7 1867<\u><\s> 2 
On Ovibos Moschatus (Blainville) 
by 
W Boyd Dawkins M.A. Oxon F.G.S. 
Communicated by Prof. Huxley F.R.S 
Received May 9 - 1867 Read May 23 - 1867 
Contents 
[paragraph]1. <u>Introduction<\u> 
[paragraph]2 Natural History 
[paragraph]3 Habits and Present Range. 
[paragraph]4 Osteology. 
[paragraph]6 Range in time. Fossil remains. 
[paragraph]5 Comparative Measurements. 
[paragraph]7 Relation of Ovibos Moschatus to Bootherium. 
[paragraph]8 Summary. 
The author will insert more 
references if the referees think 
fit
